title: Positional Blocking
description: Blocking without contact; positioning oneself so as to $impede:impeding$ an opponent’s movement on the track. $Positional blocking:positional-blocking$ need not be intentional.
regExp: /([\s\,\.\!\-\(\)\'\"\“\”\’]|^)(Positional Blocking|positional block|positional blocks|positionally block|positionally blocks|positionally blocked|positionally blocking)([\s\,\.\!\-\(\)\'\"\“\”\’]|$)/gi
